Package org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer

Class OptimizationContext.OperatorContext

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.optimizer.OptimizationContext.OperatorContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
EstimationContext
Enclosing class:
OptimizationContext
public class OptimizationContext.OperatorContext extends Object implements EstimationContext
Represents a single optimization context of an Operator. This can be thought of as a single, virtual execution of the Operator.

      public void setInputCardinality(int inputIndex, CardinalityEstimate cardinality)
